uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Internal ID used to identify the party inside a document.

label.title: Label
label.description: Useful identifier, such as home, work, etc.

po_box.title: Post Office Box
po_box.description: Box number or code for the post office box located at the address.

num.title: Number
num.description: House or building number in the street.

locality.title: Locality
locality.description: Village, town, district, or city, typically inside a region.

region.title: Region
region.description: Province, county, or state, inside a country.

coords.title: Coordinates
coords.description: When the postal address is not sufficient, coordinates help locate the address more precisely.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Any additional semi-structure details about the address.

Address.description: Address defines a globally acceptable set of attributes that describes a postal or fiscal address.
